title: Task 95

question.text: What activities does Brian do on Sundays?

answers.answer: Walk in the park in the morning and works on coding in the afternoon
answers.feedback: The time of the day is wrong.

answers.answer: He spends the whole day working on a coding project for his job
answers.feedback: Brian's coding project is personal, not for his job.

answers.answer: He works on his personal coding project in the morning and evening, and takes a walk in the afternoon

dialogue.text: I have a relaxing Sunday too.
In the morning and in the evening, I work on a personal coding project.
In the afternoon, I take a break and go for a quick walk in the park.

description: A personal coding project refers to a coding activity that someone does for personal interest or development. It is not directly related to work.
